title: Marat.Sade (Peter Brook, 1967)_x264.mkv_5subs
description:
Marat/Sade is the short title for "The Persecution and Assassination of Jean-Paul Marat as Performed by the Inmates of the Asylum of Charenton Under the Direction of the Marquis de Sade," a 1967 film adaptation of Peter Weiss' play of the same name. The screen adaptation is directed by Peter Brook, and originated in his theatre production for the Royal Shakespeare Company. 

In an insane Asylum, Marquis de Sade directs the Jean Paul Marat's last days through a theather play. The actors are the patients.
